attributes.action: simplify the tax and benefits system in the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present taxation and benefits regime within the UK is ridiculously and unnecessarily overcomplicated. There should be a minimum wage set at a level which is enough for the recipient to live on. If additional income is necessary for the support of children there should be a simple system of child benefit as has previously existed. The tax credit system is too complicated.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
